questions.answer_description:
NetFlow provides extremely granular and accurate traffic measurements and a high-level collection of aggregated traffic. The output of netflow information is displayed via the show ip cache flow command on routers. The Table shows a description of the fields for NetFlow output.
Table. Netflow Output escription
questions.question_text: You want to gather as much detail as possible during a network audit, to include data time stamping across a large number of interfaces, customized according to interface, with a minimal impact on the network devices themselves. Which tool would you use to meet these requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
NetFlow offers the best combination of features for your requirements: precise time stamping, interface-level customization, minimal impact on network devices, and scalability for large networks.

questions.question_text: Which consideration is the most important for the network designer when considering IP routing?

discussion.content:
If 0000 can be summarized as : then why isn't A correct? 
That's what is happening with the second group of 0000:0000 in the C option. I think this is incorrect.

comments.content: Nevermind. Please delete the comment. I figured out why it was correct.

questions.question_text:
What is the most compact representation of the following IPv6 address?
2001:db8:0000:0000:cafe:0000:0000:1234
A campus network needs end-to-end QoS tools to manage traffic and ensure voice quality. Which three types of QoS tools are needed? (Choose three.)

discussion.content: i would say AEF, selecting physical and networked infrastructures is redundant and doesnt outline the services needed for assessment.

SONA has 3 Layer:
Application Layer
Interactive Service Layer
Networked Infrastructure Layer

https://www.dummies.com/programming/networking/cisco/cisco-networking-service-oriented-network-architecture-sona/
